definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: I was going to perm my hair today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天本来要去烫头发的。

sentences.english: I made an appointment for a perm.
Why can't I perm my hair if I am not working?
sentences.chinese: 你想想你要没工作就更不能烫头发，这么想心就平。

sentences.english: Mary is at the beauty salon getting a perm.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉在美容沙龙烫头发。

sentences.english: Today, I was reading a magazine while straightening my hair.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在烫头发的时候看杂志看的入了迷。

sentences.english: Do you want a perm like you had last time?
sentences.chinese: 您要不要跟上一次一样烫头发？

sentences.english: I made an appointment for a perm at 00.
My hair looks deadly flat. I'd like to have a perm today.
sentences.chinese: 我的头发看起来好塌，我今天想烫头发。

definition: to condition or dye the hair using hair treatment product in conjunction with a hair steamer
to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
